name: Housecarl

aspects.high_concept: Elite Warrior Sworn to Protect Their Thane
other_aspects: Trained in All Forms of Combat
Shield and Sword of Their Lord

stunts: Shield Tactics: +2 to defend with Fight when using a shield, can protect adjacent allies
Sworn Protector: Once per session, automatically succeed on defense roll to protect their thane from harm (taking damage themselves)
Versatile Warrior: No penalty when switching between melee and ranged combat styles

trust_clock.description: Respect and loyalty - starts higher if player is appointed thane, grows with honorable actions

notes: Housecarls are elite warriors assigned to protect thanes and important nobles. When a player earns the title of Thane in a hold, they are often assigned a housecarl. These warriors are intensely loyal, skilled in combat, and will follow their thane into battle. They can serve as companions, guards, and advisors on martial matters.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Formal, military bearing, uses honorifics, direct when discussing duty
quirks: Stands at attention when addressing thane

combat_tactics: Housecarls are versatile fighters who excel with sword and shield but can adapt to any situation. They prioritize protecting their thane above all else, positioning themselves between their charge and danger. They coordinate well with others and never retreat unless ordered.
